website_summaries.verdict: Good quality and quantity for the price.
pros: Anti-glare and improves driving visibility.UV400 lens technology absorbs 100% UVA and UVB rays
The yellow ones make things look clearer when it's raining or at night
Great for outdoor sports, such as fishing, skiing, and walking
cons: May not be suitable for glasses where bridge is very thick

customer_reviews.title: awesome set, great value!
customer_reviews.text: these are amazing! I got them for my mom who was visiting me in orlando and her transitions didn't get dark enough for the intense sun here plus, while we were at Disney world, she didn't want the hassle of having to remove clip on sunglasses every time we'd go into a store or indoor attraction, only to have to put them right back on. each set of sunglasses comes in a little plastic case, keeping them safe if you throw rhemcin a backpack or purse and there are different uses for each one. this was a great buy! they were delayed in shipping for two days for whatever reason, but the products themselves are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: M.O.

customer_reviews.title: Very functional.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was hoping they would be. Easy to use. I like having more than one in case I lose one. But so far that hasn't happened. The flip function has stopped me from constantly taking them off....
customer_reviews.author: ECN

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglass flips
customer_reviews.text: These flips are great. They come with individual carrying cases for each pair. Can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Reid

customer_reviews.title: The practical sun glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like to much the service and of course the price and the time that I get them, thankyou very very much
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: great buy, fast service, seller very helpfull.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Arrived in short time. Package was wrapped well. The clipon runs a tad smaller the the standard store bought frames, with this said, order thr next size up. Material is very good, not cheaply made. Lense colors work very well, polorization really cuts down glare. Price is better than walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: These are great clip ons for all my prescription glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are great clip ons for all my prescription glasses. Yellow color is not polarized, which I knew, but it is a great lens to use on overcast days. The other 3 are polarized and work perfectly. Great value and will order again if I need them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burns

customer_reviews.title: great fit + value
customer_reviews.text: These fit the shape of my glasses perfectly, and the individual cases are nice to have. I wish the hinge didn't stick out on the top so prominently - otherwise it would be hard to tell these were clip-ons at a glance.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rosenfield

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger than I needed because reviews said that they run small and they are too big. However, I am satisfied with them and particularly like the brown ones for daytime driving and the yellow ones for night driving. I do not plan on returning them and may even buy some for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline L.

customer_reviews.title: the best fitting lens is the yellow one
customer_reviews.text: These glasses seem to work and fit on my glasses. One thing I noticed is that they don't all see to be the same size, for instance, if I use the dark gray lenses, then the clip on covers the full lens on the left side but covers about 90% of the right lens. To me, the best fitting lens is the yellow one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B

customer_reviews.title: Love the cases
customer_reviews.text: Love the cases, love the fit. Now need more sunshine!! Will be great in winter, and can't wait to try the night time glare reducing lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Miss M

customer_reviews.title: So-so purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are very flimsy and are not polarized as advertised. They do serve a purpose and are very usable. They do not replace actual sunglasses, however.
customer_reviews.author: Frances H. Moroz

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Unusable. Front plastic part of clip is angled so much that they slide up on my glasses. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: JDFla

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much I bought more to share with my family.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: They seem to have some kind of distortion. Weird dots I see in the window tint of my truck. That are not visible at any other time. And, just a little bit to small. I don't think I'd purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ray John Jay Johnson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe polarized, but not acting like it!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping for the yellow sunglasses to cut back on glare and halos during night driving, but all it did was make everything have a yellow tint. It did help a little when facing approaching vehicles with bright white LED lights.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thibault

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered what I thought was the right measurement for my glasses,but I guess their sizes aren't the same as what I asked for, easily too small for my lenses
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P In

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Each on comes in it’s own hard plastic case! Great value for the money. I got these for my husband and he really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. A.

customer_reviews.title: Night Vision
customer_reviews.text: Needed to cut the glare when I drove in the dark, which I do every morning to work. These worked great! Great price and value. Use the sunglasses as well and able to give two pair to hubby as well so a great bargain all around.
customer_reviews.author: KG PBSS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice clip-on lens
customer_reviews.text: I really like the lens color variety. I bought them to put on my bifocal glasses I wear while driving. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Woody62

customer_reviews.title: Too much glare.
customer_reviews.text: Too much glare from the sides, especially under direct sunlights on the outdoor hiking trips. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: WH310

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know what you're ordering.
customer_reviews.text: It's not the seller's fault. I ordered the wrong size. In hindsight, it turns out that the size I received is actually a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Garet Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Summer Driving!
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use this summer. So tired of being blinded without our prescription glasses - especially when reading GPS while driving. Now we can read AND not squint. Perfect. We also like the selection of different colors so we have an option of how dark we want the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Laura T. Gorham

customer_reviews.title: Great price look great.
customer_reviews.text: They look and work great 👍 cant beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander L.

customer_reviews.title: Obstructs
customer_reviews.text: The center clip is large and visible while wearing them. Very distracting and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Herbert

customer_reviews.title: The glasses are good but the clips needs improvements.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are good but the clips are not stable and is always fall out of place. I put reinforcements and put glue on all the glasses to hold it in place permanently.
customer_reviews.author: I. Arganosa

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Others that I bought didn't have the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my wife and she really likes them especially because she an keep a pair in each to the cars too. Good product. Others that I bought didn't have the fit that these have and she can also swing them up while she is still wearing them in order to see without having to remove them.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce N.

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Broke easy.don't clip well .clips too big in the line of view
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Punasi clip ones work well
customer_reviews.text: They are working out well. Actually, I use one of the two darker shaded ones when I am watching tv later in the evening and I want to tamp down the bright light. I don't use them outside because I already have sunglasses and regular glasses with transition lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Zaborske

customer_reviews.title: These did not work for me. They would not ...
customer_reviews.text: These did not work for me. They would not fit over the bridge on my glasses so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: ucandoit

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Was just as advertised. I feel it was a good value. Use them often.
customer_reviews.author: SgtRick

customer_reviews.title: I bought the medium size, they fit my lenses ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the medium size, they fit my lenses just right on my eyeglasses, really help with the glare from the sun in summer and winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Polarizing clip-ons
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on the glasses, good polarized cutting of glare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Being prime it took 7 days
customer_reviews.text: Came as described plus came with plastic case's. Only giving it a 4 rating because it's a prime item and should have been 2 days. So far I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: pretty good for the price. The customer service from this company was exceptional. When I first received these glasses, they were a little small for my frames. The company contacted me and voluntarily replaced them with a larger size at no charge. They truly try very hard to satisfy their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: too small and narrow nose space cuts into nose. Had to trim with scissors.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD RUFFALO

product_meta.title: Punasi 4-Pack Polarized Clip-on Plastic Sunglasses Lenses for Outdoor Walking Driving Fishing Cycling - (Night Vision Yellow + Grey + Dark Brown + Dark Green)
feature_bullets: HD TAC Shatterproof PC Resin Len

Note: Sunglasses have higher upper edges than prescription glasses. If you're not sure whether this size will cover your glasses perfectly, it is recommended that you should choose a bigger size. Product Dimensions: Medium size: L 2.28"(58mm) X W 1.53"(39mm); bridge: 0.51"(13mm).
Lightweight and scratch resistant, easy to clip on to any regular glasses, not suitable for glasses which bridge is very thickness.
Improve your vision, reduce glare, and sharpen your eye sight.
UV400 Lens Technology, absorbing over 99% of harmful UVA&UVB spectrums.
The clip is forged by premium metal material and with rubber cover on each leg - Provides you a durable, sturdy and protective product.
